meanings.definition: The quality of being stylish and fashionable.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded chicness at the party.
meanings.sent2: The chicness of her dress caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The chicness of his mismatched socks was unintentional but amusing.
meanings.sent4: She added a touch of chicness to her room with a single elegant vase.
meanings.sent5: The chicness of the runway models made the audience gasp in awe.

meanings.definition: The state of being elegant and sophisticated.
meanings.sent1: The chicness of the ballroom was breathtaking.
meanings.sent2: His demeanor exuded chicness and charm.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked with unexpected chicness, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The chicness of the old mansion was a reminder of a bygone era.
meanings.sent5: She carried herself with such chicness that all eyes were on her.
